languages.text: "Ты слышала те странные помехи в воксе? Так звучат взломанные передачи. Зачем кому-то из моих слуг это делать?"
"Did you hear those strange noises on the vox-line? That is what intercepted transmissions sound like. Why would one of my servants do that?"
languages.original_text: "Ты слышала те странные помехи в воксе? Так звучат взломанные передачи. Зачем кому-то из моих слуг это делать?"

traits.locale_text: "Did you hear the weird noises in the vox-caster? This is what hijacked transmissions sound like. Why would one of my servants do that?"
"Did you hear the weird noises in the vox-caster? This is what hijacked transmissions sound like. Why would one of my servants do that?"
"Did you hear the weird noises in the vox-caster? That is what hijacked transmissions sound like. Why would one of my servants do that?"
"Did you hear the weird noises in the vox-caster? That is what hijacked transmissions sound like. Why would one of my servants do that?"
"Did you hear those strange noises on the vox-line? That is what intercepted transmissions sound like. Why would one of my servants do that?"
"Did you hear those strange noises on the vox-line? That is what intercepted transmissions sound like. Why would one of my servants do that?"

languages.text: «¿Ha oído esos ruidos extraños en la línea de voco? Así es como suenan las transmisiones interceptadas. ¿Por qué iba a hacer eso uno de mis sirvientes?».
languages.original_text: "Did you hear those strange noises on the vox-line? That is what intercepted transmissions sound like. Why would one of my servants do that?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Ha oído esos ruidos extraños en la línea de voco? Así es como suenan las transmisiones interceptadas. ¿Por qué iba a hacer eso uno de mis sirvientes?».

languages.text: “你听没听到音阵通讯里奇怪的噪点声？那是信号被截获时发出的声音。如果真是我干的，我的仆人还有必要这么做吗？”
languages.original_text: "Did you hear those strange noises on the vox-line? That is what intercepted transmissions sound like. Why would one of my servants do that?"

traits.locale_text: “你听没听到音阵通讯里奇怪的噪点声？那是信号被截获时发出的声音。如果真是我干的，我的仆人还有必要这么做吗？”

languages.text: 「ヴォクス回線の奇妙なノイズが聞こえたか？あれが通信を妨害した音のようだ。どうして{mf|俺|私}の従者の誰かがそんなことをする必要がある？」
languages.original_text: "Did you hear those strange noises on the vox-line? That is what intercepted transmissions sound like. Why would one of my servants do that?"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォクス回線の奇妙なノイズが聞こえたか？あれが通信を妨害した音のようだ。どうして{mf|俺|私}の従者の誰かがそんなことをする必要がある？」

languages.text: « Vous avez entendu ces bruits étranges, sur la ligne-vox ? C'est à cela qu'on reconnaît une transmission interceptée. Pourquoi l'un de mes serviteurs ferait-il une chose pareille ? »
languages.original_text: "Did you hear those strange noises on the vox-line? That is what intercepted transmissions sound like. Why would one of my servants do that?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez entendu ces bruits étranges, sur la ligne-vox ? C'est à cela qu'on reconnaît une transmission interceptée. Pourquoi l'un de mes serviteurs ferait-il une chose pareille ? »

languages.text: "Voks hattındaki garip sesleri duydunuz mu? İletiler dinleniyorsa böyle sesler çıkar. Hizmetkârlarımdan biri neden bunu yapsın ki?"
languages.original_text: "Did you hear those strange noises on the vox-line? That is what intercepted transmissions sound like. Why would one of my servants do that?"

traits.locale_text: "Voks hattındaki garip sesleri duydunuz mu? İletiler dinleniyorsa böyle sesler çıkar. Hizmetkârlarımdan biri neden bunu yapsın ki?"

languages.text: "Habt Ihr diese seltsamen Geräusche im Vox-System gehört? So hören sich abgefangene Übertragungen an. Warum sollte einer meiner Diener das tun?"
languages.original_text: "Did you hear those strange noises on the vox-line? That is what intercepted transmissions sound like. Why would one of my servants do that?"

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr diese seltsamen Geräusche im Vox-System gehört? So hören sich abgefangene Übertragungen an. Warum sollte einer meiner Diener das tun?"
